sentence.text: Boot time - Fast. 256GB SSD works and helps the laptop to run faster.
User friendly and has a nice processor. Good battery life.
User friendly and has a nice processor. Good battery life.
I literally only had this computer for 30 days and it is acting crazy it will not update and will not allow me to use all of the computer features at all this sucks and I want my money back.

aspectTerm.opinion_words: acting crazy will not update will not allow me to use

sentence.text: Im really enjoying my new Dell laptop. I love the features and how the feel of typing on the keyboard. I reccomend this laptop for the price (: Super satisfied.

Poor quality. Had to return it in less than two weeks due to a horrible fan noise that came out of nowhere. Too bad it happened, I really liked this laptop for its performance features but its build quality is too questionable.
Poor battery life. Display and speed are okay. In Overall will not recommend.

I learning to love this light weight laptop for it's functionality and it's speed. The keys are large enough that I don't have to squint and the only issue is the light that shows the keys, I wish would stay on longer.

aspectTerm.opinion_words: large enough that I don't have to squint

sentence.text: GREAT LAPTOP OVERALL, good speed. Love the fact that it is a touch screen.

Extremely simple to set up. Powerful enough to run statistics software for class, while I'm taking notes in Google Docs and checking the syllabus online. The processing speed is good, and graphics are great. Figuring out how to access the software that comes with it (McAfee, I think???) via Best Buy's "library" is a bit confusing, but overall a great purchase experience.
User friendly,lightweight & durable,very good looking & great finish product.

aspectTerm.opinion_words: very good looking and great finish

sentence.text: There are better laptops for the price.
Great machine for the price. Good performance look and feel. I highly recommend Dell products.

Performance is not good. Though I haven't tested using complex applications because the laptop keeps hanging for small apps like one note, word, etc. I don't recommend this at all. Best buy is not accepting returns as the return period is expired which is 20 days (Unusual).
Very quick and easy to set up. The performance seems good to this point and the battery life is strong. The only downside is that it seems a bit heavy for it's size.
Very quick and easy to set up. The performance seems good to this point and the battery life is strong. The only downside is that it seems a bit heavy for it's size.
Nice screen. Mouse stopped working after a week or two. I have to use an external mouse.
Nice screen. Mouse stopped working after a week or two. I have to use an external mouse.
My only complaints are battery life - only 8 hours and only 2 USB ports.
I am very pleased with this laptop. I love the back lit keyboard,
black keyboard hard to see in dim light a few slow responses to keys had weird noise soon after purchase and took in to check

My first AMD based laptop and I have to say, I am impressed. It has great fast processor, lots of RAM, and plenty of storage for all of my needs. Browsing is fast, wireless networking adapter works great, overall device runs cool to the touch. Competitively priced.
Browsing is fast, wireless networking adapter works great, overall device runs cool to the touch.
WiFi is particularly snappy in this laptop thanks to the 802.11ax-capable card installed.
Good laptop, worked well for me but I had a hard time connecting it to WiFi
Not even a week old, free of dust and debris. Space bar decided to stick. Unsure why. After tapping the space bar again, it started functioning normally. Not so happy at the moment.
Laptop was slow not sure if its only my laptop or the M1 chip itself is slow. Also the webcam is worse
The device seems to have a charging issue, doesn’t charge while using. When it runs low on power, have to shutdown and recharge.
Still learning it coming from pc. But it’s a nice little laptop. Definitely cool finger scanner. A plus.

It's a good laptop. It definitely gets the job done, its a part of my apple family now I like it a lot, I wish I would've gotten the MacBook pro with more storage for what I want to do with it, but it works as is
Gave this to my grandson for his startup, he uses it every day. Easy to use.
Good size laptop to transport. Very light weight and useful.
It is an excellent value for laptop. Its not too heavy has nice amount of storage and ram. The the ability to turn into a tablet as well
It is an excellent value for laptop. Its not too heavy has nice amount of storage and ram. The the ability to turn into a tablet as well

Great machine. Fast for web surfing, Zoom video calls, streaming shows. Webcam is adequate but far from great. Battery life is very good - typical is like 8hrs. Tried a pen with MS OneNote and it wasnt responsive enough for note taking - so I returned the pen.

Great machine. Fast for web surfing, Zoom video calls, streaming shows. Webcam is adequate but far from great. Battery life is very good - typical is like 8hrs. Tried a pen with MS OneNote and it wasnt responsive enough for note taking - so I returned the pen.

Great machine. Fast for web surfing, Zoom video calls, streaming shows. Webcam is adequate but far from great. Battery life is very good - typical is like 8hrs. Tried a pen with MS OneNote and it wasnt responsive enough for note taking - so I returned the pen.
Really good performance, battery disappointing
Really good performance, battery disappointing
Crisp Picture Quality and Great Sound
Crisp Picture Quality and Great Sound
The fans were so loud it sound like table fan going off, straight out of the box.
Brah the sound doesn’t work anymore just tire of spending money
Was expecting better quality but the speaker sounds like a blown out car speaker.
Great computer. Extremely fast, hate windows 11 but the hardware is great.
Very high quality, excellent graphics and CPU power. Perfect for a graphic design student.
Excellent device. Works well. Very well designed. Bang for the bucks.
Sleek, light design, fast charging and good battery life.
Sleek, light design, fast charging and good battery life.

Very fast but the camera is terrible, I called Apple and was told it was a design flaw they made the hole for the camera to small so not enough light gets through. Will be fixed in 2022. So I had to return it.
Gets the job done! Lighting fast… lasts forever off of a single charge.
